column3:
Today, Anne is hungry. She wants to eat somewhere in town.
ewline
ewlineThere is a popular diner in town. She goes there and asks them if she can get fries and a
ewlinechocolate milkshake.
ewline
ewlineHer friends come into the diner and sit with her. Their names are Jane, Jake and Dave. All
ewlineof them are 15 years old.
ewline
ewlineJake gets a big cheeseburger with onions. Jane wants a vanilla ice cream cone with
ewlinesprinkles. Dave doesn't eat anything. He talks with them instead.
ewline
ewlineAfter they finish eating, they go back to Jane's house to hang out and play games. Dave
ewlinewins most of the puzzle games. Jane beats them at a few. They're racing games.
ewline
ewlineDave leaves after an hour. He needs to go do his reading homework. Jake and Anne leave
ewlinethat evening because it's a school night. They all promise to meet up again the next day
ewlineto hang out after school.
column4: multiple: What games did Jane beat the others at?
column9: one: What does Jake eat at the diner?
column14: multiple: Why does Dave leave Jane's house after only an hour?
column15: he has to do his reading homework
column18: his mother is waiting for him
column19: one: What did they promise to do the next day?
